title: Did 125 women terminate their pregnancy during a demonstration in South Korea?
subtitle: It appears that a picture of women participating in a protest demanding the legalization of abortion in South Korea has taken most of them on vitamins, not the Mefebristone abortion drug.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Some 125 women from Mephipreston were taken to terminate their pregnancy during a protest demanding the legalization of abortion in South Korea.
